pullrequest.title: Team Tang fix the docker bug.

content.raw: The names should be “scan” and “scan\_and\_dock” as it’s described in the Task Description document. Note that the task 5 name is a bit misleading but that document is what you should follow. If we change this name, we’ll let all teams know. Could you update your Docker image to reflect that change in the task 5 and let me know?
content.html: The names should be “scan” and “scan_and_dock” as it’s described in the Task Description document. Note that the task 5 name is a bit misleading but that document is what you should follow. If we change this name, we’ll let all teams know. Could you update your Docker image to reflect that change in the task 5 and let me know?

content.raw: I just tried your updated image with the “dock” and “scan\_and\_dock” tasks but the robot doesn’t move at all. Please, verify that everything is OK because it doesn’t look fine on our side.
content.html: I just tried your updated image with the “dock” and “scan_and_dock” tasks but the robot doesn’t move at all. Please, verify that everything is OK because it doesn’t look fine on our side.

pullrequest.title: Team Tang fix the docker bug.

content.raw:
I tested it on our side and it was work.

Here is the way we test:

Open two terminal to run our docker.

```
**First terminal:**
```

`$ source environment.sh`

`$ docker run -it --entrypoint "bin/bash" --name "tang" tychien/ntu_vrx_dockertest:latest`

`$ roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch world:=/home/tang/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/phase2_dock0.world urdf:=/home/tang/ntu_vrx/ntu_wamv/ntu_wamv.urdf`

```
**Second terminal:**
```

`$ docker exec -it tang /bin/bash`

`$ source environment.sh`

`$ cd /home/tang/ntu_vrx`

`$ ./docker_start.py`

docker\_start.py can auto detect the task name.

Cause the “./prepare\_task\_trials.bash” dock can only generate “dock 0~2” It can't generate the “phase2\_dock 0~5” and the task name of “dock 0~2” are not “scan“.

So we didn’t test it by entry point.

We are trying our best to solve it. If there is any suggestion please tell us.

Thanks.
content.html:
I tested it on our side and it was work.

Here is the way we test:

Open two terminal to run our docker.

**First terminal:**

$ source environment.sh

$ docker run -it --entrypoint "bin/bash" --name "tang" tychien/ntu_vrx_dockertest:latest

$ roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch world:=/home/tang/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/phase2_dock0.world urdf:=/home/tang/ntu_vrx/ntu_wamv/ntu_wamv.urdf

**Second terminal:**

$ docker exec -it tang /bin/bash

$ source environment.sh

$ cd /home/tang/ntu_vrx

$ ./docker_start.py

docker_start.py can auto detect the task name.

Cause the “./prepare_task_trials.bash” dock can only generate “dock 0~2” It can't generate the “phase2_dock 0~5” and the task name of “dock 0~2” are not “scan“.

So we didn’t test it by entry point.

We are trying our best to solve it. If there is any suggestion please tell us.

Thanks.
